Bianca Borrelli, P.Fam.Tebt. 9 + P.IFAO III 13: New Insights into Herodes' Family.

1. The Family and the Dossier. - 2. P.Fam.Tebt. 9 + P.IFAO III 13: New Edition of a Restored Repayment of a Loan. - 3. Palaeographical Analysis: The Family members' level of literacy and the hypothesis that P.IFAO III 1 belongs to the dossier.
